text:
Created attachment 27175
Proposed patch

Hi,

here is another patch that apr_table_(set|add|merge)n variant when possible.

Modified files are:
   - modules/proxy/mod_proxy.c
   - modules/generators/mod_status.c
   - modules/session/mod_session.c

The first 2 are trivial.

For the last one, I have modified the pool used. Why use the request pool and then making a copy within the session pool ? Why not directly allocate within the session pool and avoid the copy. The later is what the patch does.
creator: christophe.jaillet@wanadoo.fr
